summary: The artist's personal commentary on the decline of his country in a language closer to poetry than prose. A dark meditation on London under Thatcher.
cast: Tilda Swinton|Spencer Leigh|'Spring' Mark Adley|Gerrard McArthur|Jonny Phillips|Gay Gaynor|Matthew Hawkins|Nigel Terry|Derek Jarman
keywords: low budget|artist|british renaissance|experimental film|new york city
title: The Last of England
